Developer Documentation

Welcome to the Developer Documentation. Here you'll find any information you need on developing the Magazine Tool. This includes in-depth explanations on how things work as well as guides on how to run a local version, build and distribute new versions of the tool. Feel like something is missing, or found a typo? Go open an issue on GitHub and we'll try our best to update the Documentation as soon as possible. Any bugs you found can be reported there as well.
